mapper.insert: insert into tb_commodity(commodity_name, original_price, current_price, enable, commodity_describe, commodity_sum, is_under_revision, is_see_more, img_url) value (#{name}, #{originalPrice}, #{currentPrice}, #{enable}, #{describe}, #{sum}, #{isUnderRevision}, #{isSeeMore}, #{imgURL})
mapper.select: select commodity_id `id`, commodity_name `name`, original_price, current_price, enable, commodity_describe `describe`, commodity_sum `sum`, is_under_revision, is_see_more, img_url from tb_commodity
